ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We would like to thank Y. Loya and K. Sakai for sharing long-term datasets and J. Gilmour and colleagues for providing all data in their supplementary document. Thanks also to S. J. van Woesik for editorial comments. A. Unal was supported by The Scientific and Technological Research Council of Turkey (TUBITAK), which provided academic leave to A. Unal to visit the Florida Institute of Technology. CWC and RvW would like to thank the National Science Foundation, award NSF OCE-1657633 and OCE-1829393 to Robert van Woesik. CJR was supported by a National Science Foundation (NSF) OCE grant 1535007 to Richard B. Aronson. This is Contribution No. 135 from the Institute for Global Ecology at the Florida Institute of Technology.
